a.t-att-href: keep('/shop/product/%s' % slug(product), page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))

div.p: Please purchase a subsription to play this video
Please purchase a subsription to play this video

t.t-if: product in product_subcribed_no_expire or product.free_view == True
product not in product_subcribed_no_expire and product.free_view == False

div.h3: Your set date range may result in large numbers of video product options. Do you want to continue?
Your set filters may result in large numbers of video product options. Do you want to continue?
End Date must be later or equal to Start Date

div.label: In the future, do not show this message

form.label: Save my filters for next times

div.t-att-class: 'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse2' else 'panel-collapse collapse'
'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse3' else 'panel-collapse collapse'
'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse4' else 'panel-collapse collapse'
'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse5' else 'panel-collapse collapse'
'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse6' else 'panel-collapse collapse'

input.name: post_day
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if post_day in post_checked_days else None

div.t-att-class: 'panel-collapse collapse in' if jkv_collapse == 'collapse8' else 'panel-collapse collapse'
